item.title: EP 29 - Honey, Baby, Darling
item.itunes:title: Honey, Baby, Darling
item.description:
Today we look at the mysterious treat known as "Mad Honey" and travel back in time to investigate a UFO sighting that shut down US nuclear weapons.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Mad Honey is a controversial subject just because so few people believed it was real. But the hallucinogenic honey is actually real and well known in it's home country of Turkey where it is often used as medicine . . . and a weapon of war.

Then we visit a US military base where, in 1967, a UFO sighting is believed to have caused a shut down of 10 ICBMS, and nearly 40 years later an Air Force Captain delivers a speech to the National Press Club detailing what happened that night.

Links:

The Strange History of ‘Mad Honey’

https://modernfarmer.com/2014/09/strange-history-hallucinogenic-mad-honey/

Ex-Air Force Personnel: UFOs Deactivated Nukes

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/ex-air-force-personnel-ufos-deactivated-nukes/

Capt. Robert Salas - UFOs Shut Down Nuclear Missiles

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FbBc_LmXkbQ

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
